sentence.Network_en: He was sentenced to one year's imprisonment for committing bigamy.
sentence.Network_cn: 他因为犯重婚罪被判入狱一年.

sentence.Network_en: It developed that he had another wife living and his indictment for bigamy followed.
sentence.Network_cn: 以后发现他又娶了一房妻室,接着是他被指控犯了重婚罪.

sentence.Network_en: Bigamy lightened the horizon of his shadowy thoughts for a moment.
sentence.Network_cn: 一时间,在他的思想中模模糊糊闪出了重婚这个念头.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English : from Old French bigamie, from bigame 'bigamous', from late Latin bigamus, from bi- 'twice' + Greek -gamos 'married'

entry.def: Bigamy is the crime of marrying a person when you are already legally married to someone else.

means.word_mean: 1. having two spouses at the same time
2. the offense of marrying someone while you have a living spouse from whom no valid divorce has occurred
